title: Cookie Settings
successMessage: Your cookie preferences have been saved successfully!

introduction.title: Manage Your Cookie Preferences
introduction.content: You can change your cookie preferences at any time. Your choices will be saved and applied immediately. Some features may not work properly if you disable certain cookie categories.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled.
necessary.note: These cookies are required for basic website functionality and cannot be turned off.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting anonymous information.
analytics.details: These cookies collect information about how you use our website, such as which pages you visit most often.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements and enable newsletter subscriptions.
marketing.details: These cookies are used to deliver advertisements that are more relevant to you and your interests.
marketing.warning: Disabling marketing cookies will prevent you from subscribing to our newsletter and may affect your experience with personalized content.

save.title: Save Your Preferences
save.description: Click the button below to save your cookie preferences. Changes will take effect immediately.
